overview: When the Lucas Men are “Hooking Up,” they always land the hottest guys found throughout the world! Justin Cruise answers his need for a daddy by picking up Arpad Miklos off the streets of New York. Mathew Mason services his mechanic Fernando at the garage. Edji Da Silva picks up Tyson Tyler to fuck some fresh meat. Hans Berlin takes Kayden Gray’s massive cock up his ass. And Donato Reyes learns what it means to be topped from Michael Lucas. “Hooking Up” is the best when the Lucas Men get it on!
title: Hooking Up
